definition: Cape Haijiao in Sanya 三亞|三亚[San1 ya4], Hainan
the ends of the earth/separated worlds apart
day/sky/heaven
border/horizon/shore
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
surname Hai
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Thee ends of the earth have made, only Shien infinite period.
sentences.chinese: 天涯海角有盡處，只有師恩無窮期。

sentences.english: She would go to the ends of the earth to make a better life for the family .
sentences.chinese: 爲了讓她的家庭過上比較好的生活，她願去天涯海角。

sentences.english: I'll find him to the ends of the earth and then knock his head off.
sentences.chinese: 天涯海角我都要找到他，然後敲掉他的腦袋。

sentences.english: The ends of the earth have made, only Shien infinite period.
sentences.chinese: 天涯海角有盡處，只有師恩無窮期。

sentences.english: He looked at her step backwards, he can not catch the remotest corners of the globe to.
sentences.chinese: 他看着她一步步向後退，退到他抓不到的天涯海角。

sentences.english: Always dreamed of being a castaway?
sentences.chinese: 經常夢想逃到天涯海角嗎？

sentences.english: She would go to the ends of the earth to make a better life for the family.
sentences.chinese: 爲了讓她的家庭過上比較好的生活，她願去天涯海角。

sentences.english: Sanya is a special place called-"The end of the Earth."
sentences.chinese: 三亞，一個被稱作“天涯海角”的地方。

sentences.english: The ends of the earth has made, only shien infinite period.
sentences.chinese: 天涯海角有盡處，只有師恩無窮期。

sentences.english: Today, it is an immensely popular tourist attraction.
sentences.chinese: 今天，天涯海角是極受歡迎的旅遊勝地。

sentences.english: Go to faraway places Davao Islands to have a look.
sentences.chinese: 到天涯海角海南島去看一看。

sentences.english: I will walk on as long as the sky is blue, until I find them.
sentences.chinese: 哪怕是走到天涯海角，我也一定要找到他們。

sentences.english: We're visiting Tianya Haijiao, Wanquan River and many other beautiful places.
sentences.chinese: 遊覽“天涯海角”，菀泉河還有別的許多好地方。

sentences.english: Do you know why this place is called "Land's End"?
sentences.chinese: 你知道爲什麼這裏被稱作“天涯海角”嗎？

sentences.english: But also the remotest corners of the globe as traveling, collecting Yuting appearance with.
sentences.chinese: 但也能天涯海角任遨遊，怡情雨亭長相伴。

sentences.english: Would go anywhere with you even there's no road.
sentences.chinese: 哪怕沒有路也願意隨你天涯海角。

definition: see 天涯海角[tian1 ya2 hai3 jiao3]
cape/promontory
ten thousand crags and torrents (idiom); the trials and tribulations of a long journey/a long and difficult road
the other end of the world/a faraway place
lit. when the seas run dry and the stones go soft (idiom)/fig. forever/until the end of time
long and arduous journey (idiom)
see 天荒地老[tian1 huang1 di4 lao3]
so close, yet worlds apart (idiom)
a whole lifetime (idiom); all my life
to travel over land and water (idiom)
until the end of time (idiom)
to roam far and wide (idiom)/to travel the world
high as the mountain and long as the river (idiom); fig. noble and far-reaching
to fly high and run far (idiom); to leave in a hurry for a distance place
to go far/to escape to faraway places
this life
